value.title: Monitor and report on security events in Azure AD
value.excerpt: Keep tabs on security events in your Azure AD resources by using built-in reporting and monitoring capabilities. Respond to events as they happen, and address security risks before they become a problem.

value.title: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure
value.excerpt: Planning for implementing SAP solutions on Azure

value.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

value.title: React to state changes in your Azure services by using Event Grid
value.excerpt: Build a serverless application architecture, automate your operations, and integrate applications by handling Azure events with Event Grid.

value.title: Read text with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Optical character recognition (OCR) enables artificial intelligence (AI) systems to read text in images, enabling applications to extract information from photographs, scanned documents, and other sources of digitized text.

value.title: Manage software delivery by using a release based workflow on GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to implement a release based workflow on GitHub using project boards, branches, and releases.

value.title: SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage
value.excerpt: AP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) provides virtual machines for deploying and running SAP HANA. This module explores the SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) solution that builds on assigned, non -shared host/server bare -metal hardware.

value.title: Search and organize repository history by using GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to search and organize repository history by using filters, blame, and cross-linking on GitHub.

value.title: Secure access to your applications by using Azure identity services
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Active Directory, single sign-on (SSO), multi-factor authentication (MFA), and Conditional Access can help you manage and secure identities on Azure.

value.title: Choose the best Azure serverless technology for your compute scenario
value.excerpt: Examine Azure's serverless technologies and choose the right service for your scenario.

value.title: Simplify cloud procurement and governance with Azure Marketplace
value.excerpt: Overview of using Azure Marketplace for cloud procurement and governance for customers

value.title: Solve optimization problems by using quantum-inspired optimization
value.excerpt: Learn how quantum-inspired algorithms mimic quantum physics to solve difficult optimization problems.

value.title: Spark architecture fundamentals
value.excerpt: Spark architecture fundamentals

value.title: Introduction to threat modeling
value.excerpt: Explore the four high-level steps of threat modeling.

value.title: Understand the normal curve
value.excerpt: Learn about the normal curve

value.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: There are a variety of commonly used SAP-certified operating systems supported by SAP running on Azure VMs, and there are also several different methods of provisioning storage for SAP workloads in Azure. In this module, you will learn the SAP recommended support products and VM types as well as the network, database, and monitoring requirements.

value.title: Utilize Azure for SAP workloads reference architecture
value.excerpt: Utilize Azure for SAP Workloads Reference Architecture

value.title: Work with DataFrames advanced methods in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Work with DataFrames advanced methods in Azure Databricks

value.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Learn how to create transactions, manage memory, and use the cache-aside pattern with Azure Cache for Redis

value.title: Automate your deployments with Azure DevOps learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to combine automation techniques such as infrastructure as code with automated pipelines to provision and configure the infrastructure you need to run your applications and services.

topItems.title: Provision infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how infrastructure as code enables you to describe and automatically provision the infrastructure that you need for your application.

topItems.title: Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Run configuration management tools in Azure Pipelines to help keep your infrastructure configured as you need.

topItems.title: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Automate your deployments with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: Learn how to combine automation techniques such as infrastructure as code with automated pipelines to provision and configure the infrastructure you need to run your applications and services.

topItems.title: Provision infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how infrastructure as code enables you to describe and automatically provision the infrastructure that you need for your application.

topItems.title: Configure infrastructure in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Run configuration management tools in Azure Pipelines to help keep your infrastructure configured as you need.

topItems.title: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Provision databases in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 4: Describe general security and network security features
value.excerpt: Learn about the various Azure services you can use to help ensure that your cloud resources are safe, secure, and trusted.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Fundamentals
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to the basics of Azure.

topItems.title: Protect against security threats on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure can help you protect the workloads you run both in the cloud and in your on-premises datacenter.

topItems.title: Secure network connectivity on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the various Azure services you can use to help ensure that your network is safe, secure, and trusted.

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 6: Describe Azure cost management and service level agreements
value.excerpt: Learn about the factors that influence cost, tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend, and how Azure's service-level agreements (SLAs) can impact your application design decisions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Fundamentals
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to the basics of Azure.

topItems.title: Plan and manage your Azure costs
topItems.excerpt: Migration to the cloud presents new ways to think about your IT expenses. This module teaches you about the factors that influence cost and tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend.

topItems.title: Choose the right Azure services by examining SLAs and service lifecycle
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure's service-level agreements (SLAs) and how they can impact your application design decisions. Also see how to access preview services and learn how they impact your planning.

value.title: Cloud storage
value.excerpt:
Gain a deep understanding of data and how it's stored on the cloud.
In this learning path, you will:

Get an overview of data and how it can be stored
Read case studies of how data is stored in distributed file systems
Learn from case studes of how NoSQL databases and cloud object storage works

In partnership with Dr. Majd Sakr and Carnegie Mellon University.

topItems.title: Cloud storage overview
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn all about data and get an overview of how it's stored, including local and distributed file systems, databases, and object storage.

topItems.title: Case studies: Distributed file systems
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Discover how distributed file systems work, then learn about Hadoop and Ceph.

topItems.title: Case studies: NoSQL databases and cloud object storage
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn about two more types of storage - NoSQL databases and object storage - with case studies from industry.

value.title: Create conversational AI solutions
value.excerpt: Conversational AI revolves around user interactions, in this case through Bots. In this learning path, you will learn how to create chat bots and integrate the bot with various AI services to add intelligence to the interaction. Learn how to integrate the QnA Maker Service (an easy method to add question and answers for bots), and explore the new Virtual Assistant scenarios for creating branded experiences with bots.

topItems.title: Build a chat bot with the Azure portal
topItems.excerpt: Create and test a basic chat bot using the Azure portal

topItems.title: Design a bot conversation flow
topItems.excerpt: Learn the principles of good bot design and implement conversational flows, knowledge bots, and how to hand-off interactions to a human.

topItems.title: Create a Bot with the Bot Framework Composer
topItems.excerpt: User the Bot Framework Composer to quickly and easily build sophisticated conversational bots without writing code.

value.title: Get started with Machine Learning with an Azure Data Science Virtual Machine
value.excerpt: Azure includes a pre-configured virtual machine service for performing Data Science tasks. Learn how to use the Azure Data Science Virtual Machine to do common data analysis and machine learning tasks.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Azure Data Science Virtual Machine
topItems.excerpt: Azure provides some pre-configured virtual machine images specifically designed for data science.  Learn how you can use these to get a jump start on your data science work.

images.title: Introduction to the Azure Data Science Virtual Machine

topItems.title: Explore the types of Azure Data Science Virtual Machines
topItems.excerpt: You learn about the types of Azure Data Science Virtual Machines (DSVM) and when to use each type.  You will learn about the Windows-based and Linux-based DSVMs which each support different needs.

images.title: Explore the types of Azure Data Science Virtual Machines

topItems.title: Provision and use an Azure Data Science Virtual Machine
topItems.excerpt: Provision and use an Azure Data Science Virtual Machine

images.title: Provision and use an Azure Data Science Virtual Machine
Introduction to the Azure Data Science Virtual Machine

value.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI in government
value.excerpt: It is imperative to reflect on the implications of AI in government. In this learning path, you will be provided with guidelines to assist in setting up principles and a governance model in your government organization. You will also be provided with resources, best practices, and tools.

topItems.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: Explore six principles to guide AI development and use - fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability

topItems.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI in government
topItems.excerpt: Learn guiding principles for governments, and how to choose and operationalize a governance system to responsibly and successfully use AI in the public sector.

topItems.title: Discuss practices for responsible AI at Microsoft
topItems.excerpt: Discover how to translate your organization’s ethical principles into actionable guidance and tools for engineering teams and how AI can improve lives worldwide

value.title: Identify principles and practices for responsible AI
value.excerpt: It is imperative to reflect on the implications of AI in business. In this learning path, you will be provided with guidelines to assist in setting up principles and a governance model in your organization. You will also be provided with resources, best practices, and tools.

topItems.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: Explore six principles to guide AI development and use - fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability

topItems.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: Learn guiding principles for organizations, and how to choose and operationalize a governance system to responsibly and successfully use AI in the enterprise.

topItems.title: Discuss practices for responsible AI at Microsoft
topItems.excerpt: Discover how to translate your organization’s ethical principles into actionable guidance and tools for engineering teams and how AI can improve lives worldwide

value.title: Implement knowledge mining with Azure Cognitive Search
value.excerpt: Do you have information locked up in structured and unstructured data sources?  Using Azure Cognitive Search, you can extract key insights from this data, and enable applications to search and analyze them.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Cognitive Search solution
topItems.excerpt: Unlock the hidden insights in your data with Azure Cognitive Search.

topItems.title: Create an enrichment pipeline with Azure Cognitive Search
topItems.excerpt: Use the power of artificial intelligence to enrich your data and find new insights.

topItems.title: Create a knowledge store with Azure Cognitive Search
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to persist the output from an Azure Cognitive Search enrichment pipeline for independent analysis or downstream processing.

value.title: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM Identity
value.excerpt: After completing this learning path, you’ll know how to implement identity in Azure. You’ll be able to extend an existing on-premises Active Directory identity service into Azure.

topItems.title: Implement hybrid identity with Windows Server
topItems.excerpt: Implement hybrid identity with Windows Server

topItems.title: Deploy and manage Azure IaaS Active Directory domain controllers in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Deploy and manage Azure IaaS active directory domain controllers in Azure
